welcome.title: Wellness Wheel
welcome.subtitle: Track your journey to a balanced life

auth.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters
auth.termsDisclaimer: By creating an account, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

terms.title: Terms & Privacy
terms.text: By continuing, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy. We respect your privacy and will never sell your data.
terms.accept: I accept the terms and privacy policy

intro.title: Life Areas
intro.text: We help you track 8 key areas of life: Health, Family, Career, Relationships, Finances, Free Time, Environment, and Meaning & Purpose.

areas.title: Which areas do you want to focus on?
areas.subtitle: Select at least one (you can change this later)

ai.title: Meet Your AI Coach
ai.text: Get personalized advice and support from our AI wellness coach, available 24/7.

tracking.title: Track Your Progress
tracking.text: Set goals, track your mood, and journal your gratitude daily.

premium.title: Premium Features
premium.text: Free users get 5 AI messages per day and goals in one life area. Upgrade for unlimited access!

done.title: You're all set!
done.text: Let's start your journey to a more balanced life.

home.subtitle: How are you feeling today?
home.upgradeText: Unlock unlimited AI messages and goals in all life areas

mood.title: Mood & Gratitude
mood.subtitle: Track your daily wellbeing
mood.thankYou: Thank you for tracking your mood

gratitude.title: What are you grateful for?
gratitude.subtitle: Write at least one thing you're grateful for today
gratitude.enterText: Please enter something you're grateful for

ai.title: AI Wellness Coach
ai.welcome: Hi! I'm your AI Wellness Coach
ai.intro: Ask me anything about your wellness journey, goals, or life balance.
ai.suggestion1: How can I improve my work-life balance?
ai.suggestion2: Help me set a health goal

analytics.aiInsight: Your wellness journey is trending positively! Keep up the great work.
